comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: Barrier Miner (Broken Hill, NSW : 1888 - 1954) Sunday 8 August 1915 trove.nla.gov.au/ndp/del/article/45347583 reports on the evacuation of Warsaw with the Russians taking everything of value, mentioning such metal in particular. This was part of the "Great Retreat", the Russian retreat from Galicia and Poland during World War I en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Great_Retreat_%28Russian%29
